c1.name: Shoban: Ostentatious Plumage
c1.descriptionRaw:
When in the <color=#FFD780FF>Windfavored</color> state, the Attack SPD of the Wanderer's Kuugo: Fushoudan and Kuugo: Toufukai is increased by 10%.
Additionally, the wind arrows fired by the Passive Talent "Gales of Reverie" will deal an additional 25% of his ATK as DMG. You must unlock the Passive Talent "Gales of Reverie" first.
c1.description:
When in the Windfavored state, the Attack SPD of the Wanderer's Kuugo: Fushoudan and Kuugo: Toufukai is increased by 10%.
Additionally, the wind arrows fired by the Passive Talent "Gales of Reverie" will deal an additional 25% of his ATK as DMG. You must unlock the Passive Talent "Gales of Reverie" first.

c2.name: Niban: Isle Amidst White Waves
c2.descriptionRaw:
When in the <color=#FFD780FF>Windfavored</color> state, <color=#FFD780FF>Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays</color> will see its DMG increased by 4% per point of difference between the max amount of Kuugoryoku Points contrasted with Kuugoryoku's present capacity when using this skill.
Through this method, you can increase Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays's DMG by a maximum of 200%.
c2.description:
When in the Windfavored state, Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays will see its DMG increased by 4% per point of difference between the max amount of Kuugoryoku Points contrasted with Kuugoryoku's present capacity when using this skill.
Through this method, you can increase Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays's DMG by a maximum of 200%.

c3.name: Sanban: Moonflower Kusemai
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Yonban: Set Adrift into Spring
c4.descriptionRaw:
When casting <color=#FFD780FF>Hanega: Song of the Wind</color>, should the Passive Talent "Jade-Claimed Flower" be triggered, the character will gain buffs in correspondence to the contacted Elemental Type(s), and also obtain a random untriggered buff. A maximum of 3 such corresponding elemental buffs can exist simultaneously.
You must unlock the Passive Talent "Jade-Claimed Flower" first.
c4.description:
When casting Hanega: Song of the Wind, should the Passive Talent "Jade-Claimed Flower" be triggered, the character will gain buffs in correspondence to the contacted Elemental Type(s), and also obtain a random untriggered buff. A maximum of 3 such corresponding elemental buffs can exist simultaneously.
You must unlock the Passive Talent "Jade-Claimed Flower" first.

c5.name: Matsuban: Ancient Illuminator From Abroad
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Hanega: Song of the Wind</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Hanega: Song of the Wind by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Shugen: The Curtains' Melancholic Sway
c6.descriptionRaw:
When the Wanderer actively hits an opponent with Kuugo: Fushoudan while in the <color=#FFD780FF>Windfavored</color> state, the following effects will occur:
路Deals an additional instance of Kuugo: Fushoudan at the position hit, dealing 40% of the attack's original DMG. This DMG will be considered Normal Attack DMG.
路When the Wanderer falls below 40 Kuugoryoku Points, restores 4 Points to him. Kuugoryoku Points can be restored in this manner once every 0.2s. This restoration can occur up to 5 times within one Windfavored duration.
